item.title: Mechanical March Challenge: Learning Golang with the Help of a Nix Flake
item.description: If you’re looking for a way to challenge yourself and improve your programming skills, the Exercism Mechanical March challenge is a great opportunity. This month, I decided to take on the challenge and tackle the Golang track. To make the process smoother and more efficient, I prepared a Nix flake that would help me in the development of the exercises. If you’re not familiar with Nix, it’s a package manager that allows for deterministic builds and is particularly helpful when working with multiple dependencies.
